condition.ab: Light brown papyrus. The original cutting lines have been preserved on all four sides. There are some small holes in the papyrus. One vertical papyrus fiber got lost from the right bottom corner in antiquity and no letters are missing.

handDesc.p: Written with a thin pen in black ink that has faded in places, perpendicular to the fibers on Recto, parallel to the fibers on Verso. There are some diacritical dots.
